sources.title: Barquero (1970) Lee Van Cleef Â· Warren Oates
sources.description: A gang of gangsters who murdered all the citizens of a small town in a weapons and money robbery are wiped out on the run to Mexico by the courage and cunning of a loner ferryman..

metadata.Plot: Jake Remy leads a gang of outlaw cutthroats making their escape toward Mexico from a successful robbery. Barring their way is a river--crossable only by means of a ferry barge. The barge operator, Travis, refuses to be bullied into providing transport for the gang and escapes across river with most of the local populace--leaving Remy and his gang behind, desperately seeking a way across. A river-wide stand-off begins between the gang and the townspeople, both groups of which have left people on the wrong side of the river.
metadata.Actors: Lee Van Cleef, Warren Oates, Forrest Tucker
